name: Opening Scene
description: Snow spirals down from the heavens on the iconic CAPITOL RECORDS BUILDING in Los Angeles.
drawing: Snow spirals down from the heavens on the iconic CAPITOL RECORDS BUILDING in Los Angeles.
caption: Snow spirals down from the heavens on the iconic CAPITOL RECORDS BUILDING in Los Angeles.

drawing: a mysterious person in a velvet hooded robe holds a [snowcapitol] in the palm of their hand.
CAPITOL RECORDS TOWER - decrepit and abandoned - leans precariously in the background.
trees and neighborhoods of Hollywood Hills and Hollywood Sign are on fire.
caption: Hollywood is burning

caption: Tiara takes a huff on her cigarette and looks around

drawing: [tiara] flanked by her lawyers

description: She pushes past her two lawyers to a mic-covered podium. Hecklers boo. Her lawyers

dialog: Move over, boys. They want to see me.

name: Jamal Unchained
description: Jamal pulls out an old photo of him and his girlfriend. In his denim coat, he, too, finds a snow globe: “Life is like a snow globe - it’s most beautiful when shaken up.”
drawing: [jamal] pulls out an old photo of him and his girlfriend

description: He walks through a BAZAAR with CHRISTMAS LIGHTS strung up over WET MARKETS and RATIONING BOOTHS.
drawing: [jamal] walks through a BAZAAR with CHRISTMAS LIGHTS strung up over WET MARKETS and RATIONING BOOTHS.
caption: night market

description: A troupe of Mexican performers hunched over dressed in sombreros with streamers, ponchos and masks stomp their feet and canes in a rhythmic do-si-do dance to the beat.
drawing: A troupe of Mexican performers hunched over dressed in sombreros with streamers, ponchos and masks stomp their feet and canes in a rhythmic do-si-do dance to the beat.
caption: mexican troupe

description: A HOVER SCOOTER gang, led by a thug with a checkerboard face tattoo, prowls through the smog looking for victims.
drawing: A HOVER SCOOTER gang on floating skateboards prowl through the smog looking for victims to rob
caption: scooter gang

description: Jamal is amazed at the Jumpers in the sky. A lot has changed in the ten years he was inside.
drawing: [jamal] iooks up at the [jumpers] flying overhead
caption: A lot has changed in ten years

description: Two turban-wearing DRUG DEALERS twirl glowing umbrellas that illuminate their ghoulish faces. One opens up his trench coat and reveals drugs. Jamal snatches the bag but doesn’t pay. He’s too big to stop.
drawing: [jamal] is approached by two DRUG DEALERS who wear large turbans and twirl glowing umbrellas that illuminate their ghoulish faces.
caption: Let the party begin

name: Annual Board Meeting

description: VIDEO: Revenue numbers and pie charts highlighting Monocorp’s financial success flash on screen.

Two guards tap their PAL headpieces and pick up Hadji, and drag him to the Jumper outside.

name: SSS-Scene
description: Tiara ducks inside.

The club features a cheaply designed fiberglass, foam alien garden set design. It’s a faux bio-luminescent grassland teeming with “exotic” plants and underwater coral reefs and plankton. More depressing than magical.
drawing: The main set design features faux bio-luminescent grassland teeming with “exotic” plants and underwater coral reefs and plankton. More depressing than magical.
caption: The club features a cheaply designed fiberglass, foam alien garden set design. It’s a faux bio-luminescent grassland teeming with “exotic” plants and underwater coral reefs and plankton. More depressing than magical.

description: The club’s scruffy, ragtag performers - most likely sex workers - wear green screen suits with surgical gloves, respiratory masks and minimal costume accessories: ears, butt plugs attached to rubber tails, alien headgear, strap-on dildos and artificial pussies.
drawing: The club’s scruffy, ragtag cosplay performers wear green screen suits with surgical gloves, respiratory masks and minimal costume accessories: ears, rubber tails, alien headgear
caption: The club’s scruffy, ragtag cosplay performers wear green screen suits with surgical gloves, respiratory masks and minimal costume accessories: ears, butt plugs attached to rubber tails, alien headgear, strap-on dildos and artificial pussies.

description: An avatar RINGMASTER appears and hypes the lonesome crowd.
dialog: Welcome to the Siamese Sex Show - the best sex you’ll never have. Escape into a fantasy of your own creation. You’re gonna cum - we guarantee it.
drawing: A ringmaster hypes the lonely crowd
caption: Welcome to the Siamese Sex Show

description: The PROPRIETOR hands Tiara an old Oculus-like tech headset like loaner shoes at a bowling alley.
drawing: The PROPRIETOR (THAI LADYBOY, 30s, beautiful) hands Tiara an old Oculus-like tech headset like loaner shoes at a bowling alley.

description:
The DJ (20-something, tall, piercing blue eyes and long hair) put a needle on the record. He stares at Tiara.
Together the performers dance and sing a sorta Lady Marmalade-like anthem that belies their weariness and despair.
drawing: The DJ put a needle on the record. He stares at Tiara.

description: From the POV of the AR headset, the club’s crude sets transform into something magical, and shaggy cosplay performers now appear as fully-realized anthropomorphic animals, avatars, aliens, and anime characters. It’s like a perverse cartoon that’s magnificently come to life!
drawing: [sssPerformers] dance in unison like anime and anthromorphic characters

description: Without the headset (a true case of rose-colored glasses) Tiara watches the cold reality of jaded performers giving perfunctory lap dances and gloved hand jobs to the sad and lonely headset-wearing female and male patrons - miserable social outliers you might find in a strip club.

name: ConferenceRoom
description: Tiara, Hadji and Jamal sit eyeing each other.
drawing: [conferenceroom] silhouettes of three people stare at each other

description: Jamal has his feet up on the table with a joint in his mouth. His face is partially hidden in shadows.
Hadji drinks from his flask.
Tiara, still in sunglasses, taps her leg, lights a cigarette and - with a french inhale - starts the convo.

dialog: I hope this doesn't take long. I'm in the middle of shooting.
drawing: [conferenceroom] [tiara] smokes and speaks with diva flair

dialog: Shooting? I thought poison was your “trade murk”.

description: Jamal leans forward into the light, gold tooth gleaming.

dialog: I know ya moved grande dame’s name from the marquee to a tombstone. Changed her wonderful life from an “is” to a “was”.
